additional_commands.label: setname
additional_commands.about: To replace default 'root' name with your name

options.label: about
options.value: Hey there! I'm Shubham Mishra, a software engineer with a passion for crafting innovative digital solutions.

options.label: skills
options.value:
I'm a versatile full-stack developer, adept at turning ideas into robust web applications.

Proficient in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Next.js, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express.js, SQL, MongoDB, Redis, Redux, Context API, Docker, Jenkins, Slack, GitHub, and Git.

options.label: experience
options.value: I have gained experience working in various roles over the years.

options.label: projects
options.value: I've had the pleasure of working on diverse projects that showcase my skills and creativity.

data.label: Ecommerce (Website) Using Sentiment Analysis
data.value: Designed and developed a comprehensive e-commerce solution that empowers businesses with advanced sentiment analysis capabilities enhancing customer engagement and product rankings.

data.label: Test Taker
data.value: Innovated and executed the development of a dynamic Test Taker WebApp providing an interactive platform for students to enhance their competitive exam preparation with immediate feedback.

data.label: Voice Notes
data.value: Pioneered the creation of a versatile web application allowing users to record voice notes or upload audio files for personal use. And ensured individual access control enabling users to manage their audio content with ease and privacy.

options.label: contact
options.value:
Feel free to reach out! You can contact me for any inquiries or collaborations.
Email: mishrashubh38@gmail.com
GitHub: https://github.com/buggiebug
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/shubham-mishra

options.label: resume
options.about: To view the resume add [ -d ] to download the resume
